content: This is a very intriguing observation, the gift economy supports the market economy heavily. There has to be sacrifice on one’s part to support another while they go participate in the market economy and monetize. Essentially one party gives so another party can go transact to make money to survive. But it is necessary for one to live a more advanced and complex life, one must be able to exchange in value in a manner that is accepted by all, so everyone can go and realize their needs and wants through the exchange of currency for labor/goods.
